results.content: this course was great once I started to use the transcript along with the videos. Without the transcript it was tough though, because I had trouble understanding the instructor due to his heavy accent. The info all seems very useful and I look forward to applying what I have learned in order to quickly land my first front-end development gig fairly quickly now.
